name: Ghost Library (ChrisSilva)
description:
Take control of the Haunted Library in this Multiplayer fast-paced action game.

Play with the Light ghost to light up the library so you can read freely

or play with the Dark ghost and turn all the lights off so you can sleep all night.

 

1 minute matches, team with most crystals wins.

Servers up to 32 players.

Arrow keys - Movement

Space - Attack
